display.label: Add messages to the log
display.description: Actions related to logging.

display.label: Action ID
display.description: An arbitrary unique string that identifies a signal instance which can be used for logging, debugging, or de-duplication. Its prefilled with UUID string but user can update it.

display.label: Message
display.description: The message parameter specifies the string to print to the log. If you add a placeholder ({}) to the message, it is replaced with streaming coordinates.

display.label: Trigger ad hoc snapshots
display.description: Actions related to ad hoc snapshots.

display.label: Action ID
display.description: An arbitrary unique string that identifies a signal instance which can be used for logging, debugging, or de-duplication. Its prefilled with UUID string but user can update it.

display.label: Collection name
display.description: An array of comma-separated regular expressions that match the fully qualified names of the data collections to include in the snapshot. The naming format depends on the database.

display.label: Snapshot type
display.description: An optional type component of the data field of a signal that specifies the type of snapshot operation to run. Currently supports the incremental and blocking types.

display.label: Stop execution of an ad hoc snapshot
display.description: Actions related to ad hoc snapshots.

display.label: Snapshot type
display.description: An optional type component of the data field of a signal that specifies the type of snapshot operation to run. Currently supports the incremental and blocking types.
